concept.title: Getting Started at the Fulton County Library
concept.shortdesc: Becoming a Fulton County Library Cardholder free and simple.

conbody.p: As a member you will have access not just to physical books, but to a plethora of online contnet such as e-books, audiobooks, and more.
Cardholders also have the ability to attend library events or reserve meeting rooms for their own events.
This manual provides a comprehensive guide to joining, and using these public services.
